home.description: This is a simple corporate website built with React Router v7 and Tailwind CSS.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To provide innovative solutions that help businesses thrive in the digital age.

story.title: Our Story
story.content1: Founded in 2025, Corporate Web has been at the forefront of web development and digital transformation. We specialize in creating modern, responsive, and user-friendly web applications using cutting-edge technologies.
story.content2: Our team of experienced developers and designers is dedicated to delivering high-quality solutions that meet the unique needs of our clients.

values.title: Our Values
items: Innovation and creativity in everything we do
Customer satisfaction as our top priority
